mapper.select: select * from board_tbl order by board_no DESC

SELECT b.* from(select ROWNUM rn, a.* from (select * from board_tbl order by board_no DESC) a
where ROWNUM <= (#{page} * 5) ) b
where b.rn > (#{page} -1) * 5
select board_no, title, content, writer, click_cnt, creation_date from board_tbl where board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.insert: insert into board_tbl (board_no, title, writer, content) values(board_seq.nextval,#{title},#{writer},#{content})
